geometry::linear_ring

geometry::linear_ring< P, V, A > Class Template Reference
[Geometry: geometric objects]

A linear_ring (linear linear_ring) is a closed line which should not be selfintersecting. More...

Inherits geometry::geometry_traits< P >.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<typename P, template< typename, typename > class V = std::vector, template< typename > class A = std::allocator>
class geometry::linear_ring< P, V, A >

A linear_ring (linear linear_ring) is a closed line which should not be selfintersecting.

Template parameters:
  • P point type
  • V optional container type, for example std::vector, std::list, std::deque
  • A optional container-allocator-type
Examples:

4_polygon_example.cpp.
